```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, include=FALSE, cache=FALSE}
### Germany
p1 <- ggplot(data = merge10, aes(x = Date, y = DAX.Close)) + geom_line() + scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(1991.1, 2015.4, 10)) + ggtitle("Germany | DAX") + theme(plot.title = element_text(size=14)) + labs(x = "Quarters", y = "Av.
```
